== Gutsy Release Party ==

Gutsy is here! What better way to celebrate the last six months of effort than by getting together with other Kenyan Ubuntu fans and having a party?!

== Location ==

Surf N Bites Restaurant, View Park Towers opposite Alliance Francaise. They have a free wifi hot spot as part of their menu.

== Date and Time ==

The party will be held on Saturday 3rd November 2007 from 4.00pm . Pop in at any time and hang out with other Kenyan Ubuntu lovers. 

If you'll attend, please add your name to this list so that a suitable location is reserved. If you are on Facebook (This is not an endorsement!!!) have a look at http://www.facebook.com/event.php?eid=5852341895
